ESCORT.Maneuverable: This ship may make two heading adjustments instead of one during the Movement Phase.

LINE.Superior Shielding: When using Charge Shields, this ship generates +1 Shields per Power spent.

CAPITAL.Supreme Shielding: When using Charge Shields, this ship generates +2 Shields per Power spent.
CAPITAL.Well Defended: When this ship takes system damage to reduce damage, reduce the damage taken by 2d6 instead of 1d6.
CAPITAL.Poor Steering: This ship can only adjust its heading at the end of its Movement Phase.
